goal: Add new API endpoint to Vue.js REST service client

steps.name: Review REST services implementation
steps.prompt: Examine RestServices.js to understand how API calls are structured in the Vue.js application.

steps.name: Add new service method
steps.prompt: Add a new method to RestServices.js for fetching user profile data from a new /api/getUserProfile endpoint.

steps.name: Update Vue component to use new service
steps.prompt: Modify the Main.vue component to call the new getUserProfile service method and display the results.
